channel.title: No class 8? Trying to add models
channel.description: Im using the complete NOOB 'Project insanity guide's source, and i'm trying to add dragon claws. I have everything made already, .dat file and so on, but it tells me to go to my class 8 and add some code. I searched in my client and it appears i have no class 8 =.= so if someone could help me out, that'd be great =]

item.title: No class 8? Trying to add models
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

Try use itemdef.java it works fine !
just do it like this

case 1269: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 0; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 2130; itemDef.modelID = 11401; itemDef.modelZoom = 1382; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 660; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 997; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 11399; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 11400; itemDef.name = "Steel pickaxe"; itemDef.description = "It's a Steel pickaxe.".getBytes(); break;

Read full topic
item.source: No class 8? Trying to add models

item.title: No class 8? Trying to add models
item.dc:creator: @reality0scape reality0scape
item.description:
@reality0scape wrote:

you have a refactored/renamed client. Try to search a tutorial for refactored/renamed clients.

Read full topic
item.source: No class 8? Trying to add models
